main.name: Ido Oren
main.occupation: People Person and also full stack developer
main.bio: Hello. my name is Ido. an experienced Sales Manager with a prooven record track working in the Automobile industry. Strong sales professional skilled in Talent Management, Customer Service, Recruiting, Team Building, and Training. I am currently finished studying as a full stack developer at Coding Academy Israel. have learend 640 hours of coding. Developer at heart combined with extensive senior experience in B2C sales and business development in the automobile industry!  7 years of successfully managing and empowering a team of up to 15 sales reps. Managerial leadership courses qualified, Training specialist in technical aspects of the product and sales methodology.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: B.A in Government, Diplomacy and Strategy.

skills.name: Vuejs
skills.description: I use Vuejs for my final projects.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: Js was my first programming language that I started using. It is by far the language I am most familiar with.

skills.name: HTML5
skills.description: learing this markup language was very pleasable .

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am new to React and really like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template.

skills.name: Scss
skills.description: Every devloper must know the basic rules of desgin, Scss make it easy.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects.

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with.

skills.name: PHP
skills.description: I have used php few times, small projects during the studies.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

projects.title: Watchat
projects.category: A React + Redux application to watch movies and chat online with others using SOCKET IO. and a server side using mongodb, deploy with HERUKU.

projects.title: Mistertoy - inventory manager
projects.category: A React + Redux, React-Router,Soket, react-toastify,react-chartjs-2 application to mange (add,edit) inventory , Geoloaction, Google maps.

projects.title: Misterbooks
projects.category: A Vue application using router,fontawsome library, google books api, add, edit, reviews.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Rennel Ongcoy must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
